name: Solar Grenade
description: Creates a flare of Solar Light that continuously damages enemies.

name: Firebolt Grenade
description: Unleashes bolts of Solar energy that seek out nearby enemies.

name: Fusion Grenade
description: Sticks to enemies and explodes.

name: Swarm Grenade
description: Releases multiple drones that chase and explode on enemies.

name: Incendiary Grenade
description: Bounces on impact and explodes, dealing damage and applying heavy Scorch.

name: Thermite Grenade
description: Creates a line of fire that damages enemies crossing it.

name: Tripmine Grenade
description: Attaches to surfaces and detonates when enemies pass through its laser trigger.

name: Healing Grenade
description: Creates an area that heals you and your allies.

name: Arcbolt Grenade
description: Chains Arc energy between nearby enemies.

name: Flashbang Grenade
description: Disorients and blinds enemies.

name: Pulse Grenade
description: Periodically damages enemies in an area.

name: Skip Grenade
description: Splits into smaller projectiles that track targets on impact.

name: Flux Grenade
description: Sticks to targets and explodes after a short delay.

name: Storm Grenade
description: Calls down a localized storm that damages enemies in its area.

name: Lightning Grenade
description: Adheres to surfaces and emits bolts of lightning.

name: Vortex Grenade
description: Creates a vortex that pulls enemies in and damages them.

name: Scatter Grenade
description: Splits into multiple projectiles on impact.

name: Magnetic Grenade
description: Attaches to enemies and explodes twice.

name: Axion Bolt
description: Releases seeker bolts that track and damage enemies.

name: Suppressor Grenade
description: Explodes and suppresses enemies, disabling their abilities.

name: Void Spike Grenade
description: Attaches to surfaces and emits damaging Void energy.

name: Void Wall Grenade
description: Creates a perpendicular wall of Void energy that damages enemies.

name: Duskfield Grenade
description: Creates a field that slows and freezes enemies.

name: Coldsnap Grenade
description: Releases seekers that freeze targets.

name: Glacier Grenade
description: Creates Stasis crystals in a wall formation.

name: Threadling Grenade
description: Spawns Threadlings that track and attack enemies.

name: Shackle Grenade
description: Suspends enemies, limiting their movement.

name: Grapple Grenade
description: Creates a grapple point for mobility.
